website_summaries.verdict: Simple design in a round-shaped double-end striking bag that is offered at a low price.
pros: Bag has an all-leather construction to give it plenty of longevity
Loops where the bag connects to the cables are reinforced to ensure a sturdy setup
Ships with all of the cables and connectors you need to start immediately
cons: Some sizes ship with S-hooks, which may pop loose during workout sessions

customer_reviews.title: Expect rubber tarp straps to come with it.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this , wasn’t pleased with the tarp straps but no biggie , I just bought bungee cord at ACE hardware cut it to my specifications and stapled the ends on it and gave them a protective poly hose cover over the nails 👍🏼 Worked out great and fun to workout too, lost track of time.
customer_reviews.author: Ulysses Saldivar

customer_reviews.title: Great bag but....
customer_reviews.text: The bag I love it’s perfect but the “string “ was crap it doesn’t come with a good one but would recommend still but know that you are probably going to want to buy some better things to hold them up with
customer_reviews.author: Dylansmith680

customer_reviews.title: Great durable bag that's now overpriced
customer_reviews.text: Full leather bag, including the attachment loops. Durable quality leather. Put air in and it stays in. Leather gloves grip bag nicely. Easy to lace up and down for bladder changes, which I don't anticipate will be needed for a long time given the way I've punished it over the past 7 months. I purchased mine from Amazon for $44 in January, 2020. Now, like pretty much all exercise equipment, it costs more than twice that much.
customer_reviews.author: Alex K

customer_reviews.title: Top notch quality bag!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality bag and easy to set up. I recommend that instead of using one of the bungees for the top strap, instead use a rigid strap/cord to better control the movement of the bag. I myself used some 550 paracord, and even implemented some clever knotting in order to quickly adjust the height/tension of the bag. The bag itself is very well made and the bladder has held air just fine since I set it up last week. I've put in about 5 hours total on the bag so far, and have had no issues at all! I am very pleased and will probably go ahead and order the 5" and 9" bags as well for additional variety.
customer_reviews.author: archit3kt

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag. High quality and have been really impressed with the stuff Ringside has been putting out. Use this bag frequently during the week and would highly recommend this bag. Its not for beginner's, but for the experienced boxer, its got a great return and will help with your development.
customer_reviews.author: Doug F.

customer_reviews.title: Deflated in a month...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my boyfriend! It was perfect! Worked well, set up great - except it went flat in a little over a month. Yes, we tried to re-inflate it, but we couldn't get it pumped because the lining seams were sewn in?? And somehow the air was just leaking out through the seams. Perhaps, he's just strong. But that was a shame :( 5-stars for when it was up and running. 3-stars overall for durability/long term use.
customer_reviews.author: Hae Jin Ha

customer_reviews.title: Wow , love it .
customer_reviews.text: Amazing bag ! I had an everlast one and I thought it was good until this one came in ! Wow , I got the 9inch one and it amazing . Nice material , looks amazing and best of all really good to train with . I use some cheap bungees from Home Depot as the stuff that comes with all the bags sucks but the bag it self does not . Worth the money just buy it !
customer_reviews.author: Tascam

customer_reviews.title: RINGSIDE Doubleend Bags are TOUGH as nails, 12hrs a day 7 days a week!
customer_reviews.text: We use nothing but RINGSIDE DOUBLEEND BAGS, with athletes,amateurs,& pro fighters using them RINGSIDE DOUBLEEND BAGS ARE TOUGH AS NAILS. (We use traditional ringside & heritage (brown) ringside doubleend bags)
customer_reviews.author: HOOLIGANS BOXING & MMA

customer_reviews.title: Great while it lasted!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was excited when I received this as the reviews are good. When I saw it, it seems to be well made, but a month and a half later, the bladder ripped. When I put air in it, it leaks out. There doesn't seem to be a way to remove it to put a new one in. So I just spent like 50 bucks for something that lasted a month. If I can replace the bladder then it won't be so bad otherwise, it's a piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: 5 star customer support
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars for customer support. This is my second bag. First performed great for years until it popped finally. Ordered another in September and sadly it popped after a week. I wrote to seller asking about an exchange or return or options. Waited 2 days to hear back and instead a FedEx truck showed up with a replacement. No questions asked, just solid customer support.
customer_reviews.author: terra r longhurst

customer_reviews.title: Well made and fun to use
customer_reviews.text: This bag is noticeably better constructed than the RDX bag that I've repaired 5 times. I bought the 5 inch bag and it's a really challenging target. It came with a pair of heavy duty bungees, i didn't need them but it was nice that they put them in there. I've seen other reviewers saying their bag needed daily inflation but so far mine has held its air
customer_reviews.author: Alison B

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful ball
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag. Wear bag gloves obviously. I replaced the bladder with a 5” rubber ball and it’s fantastic. The rubber ball (deflated) is a little challenging to squeeze in but use some dish soap to help.
customer_reviews.author: Honolii Brewing Company

customer_reviews.title: Seams fray, THICK bands, good though.
customer_reviews.text: I use this several times a week for a couple months and the seams have begun to fray. It kinda looks like a hairy testicle bouncing back and forth. The bag inside has lost a little air but topping it off works great. The THICK rubber bands it comes with are very stiff, get some bungee cords instead. I would buy it again if budget is a concern, otherwise pay a little more for different one.
customer_reviews.author: Mario

customer_reviews.title: great beginner's bag.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great beginner's double end bag. It's durable, feels great to hit, well-made. My only gripe is that I have to put air in every day. Is this normal??? It's never an issue during the workout. Just, the next day, it always needs to have several pumps of air. Other than that, it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Dr BSTop Contributor: Boxing

customer_reviews.title: Good for skill work and light cardio
customer_reviews.text: Works good for reacting to counter punching. Kind of a pain to set up to the proper tension, but once it is set up works great. Can be adjusted for people of different heights by moving bands around.
customer_reviews.author: wgb

customer_reviews.title: Good double end bag.
customer_reviews.text: It's a good double end bag. I've been using it for a while now. One of the rivets popped out on a loop, not really a big deal. I would have given this product 5 stars if it were not for the rivet.
customer_reviews.author: Top

customer_reviews.title: this is a really good bag. other reviews have mentioned that it tends ...
customer_reviews.text: this is a really good bag. other reviews have mentioned that it tends to have a slow leak, which I found to be true for my bag. but I don't mind pumping a little extra air about once a month, it only takes a few seconds and then i'm good to go. the bag is otherwise well constructed and I've been using mine several times a month for about 5 or 6 months. for the price i'm very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Warner

customer_reviews.title: Good bag, elastic bands not good.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good quality for the bag. Now the elastic bass are pretty bad, and the hooks have insane sharp edges. I’d recommend replacing the hooks with carabiners.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bag, go for it!
customer_reviews.text: Nice double end bag, real leather and seems to be made well. The bellow can also be replaced if needed later on. I would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Tone B.

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: I went to a gym where they had one of these a long time ago. It is great for hand to eye coordination. I am enjoying it.
customer_reviews.author: R. K. J.

customer_reviews.title: hit this thing couple of times and think i the next champion in boxing. quit my job yesterday
customer_reviews.text: Works great, set up in my garage and hit it a couple of times. gave me confidence and signed up for my first ameture fight beceause i was hitting it so good. quit my job during the corona virus out break and now going to pursure career in boxing since my friend said i was hitting it really good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: This is very small, hard to hit so it will def improve hand eye coordination and punch accuracy
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great bag so far, no tears, rips, or anything else. I don't use it very much either tho and i take it down when its not in use. I use it about 90 min a week. It'll loose some air after a couple weeks but nothing serious.
customer_reviews.author: arthur torres

customer_reviews.title: Great double end bag
customer_reviews.text: great double end bag, only slight issue is that the bag deflates a little with time, but easily solvable with a quick pump every week or so. comes with the bungees which is great.
customer_reviews.author: Jawad Chowdhury

customer_reviews.title: This is a good enough bag for what I need it for
customer_reviews.text: I don't box but I do some bag work for exercise. This is a good enough bag for what I need it for. I deducted a star because it doesn't come with straps like it claims. It comes with cheap bungee cords like a farmer would use to hold down a tarp on the back of a truck.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt & Rikka

customer_reviews.title: Questionable Craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: The problem with this bag is the seams. They are raised, hard, and sharp. If you like to hit the bag without gloves, you will cut your hands, as I did. These are poorly made, in my opinion. Better to spend an extra $20 and get something with smoother seams.
customer_reviews.author: Steve A

customer_reviews.title: Lasted only 5 months!
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t last long! After 5 months of using it only a couple times a week, the bladder burst.
customer_reviews.author: Love to read

customer_reviews.title: Great quality leather and easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: I am a beginner so for me this bag is great. Good quality leather, was really easy to inflate and hang. I wanted it to be a bit looser so used bungee cord. Nice target to practice, very responsive and easy on your knuckles.
customer_reviews.author: Ruslan Dobro

customer_reviews.title: Solid bag
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic bag. Comes with some stiff rubber straps that work great for a beginner-amateur, but I like it to swing pretty windly so I swapped them for bungee cords. Great product though and I would recommend it. Only concern is the inflation nipple and the brand patch can cause minor scraping on the hands of you hit it right.
customer_reviews.author: Blake Bahner

customer_reviews.title: High quality bag at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Good high quality bag at a great price. I immediately replaced the included cords but that was expected. Very happy with the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Michael P.

customer_reviews.title: Gym quality at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Had my bag for a week and couldn't be happier. This has been a great way to spend time during the quarantine! Quality is the same as I've used in boxing gyms Comes with rubber straps
customer_reviews.author: Greg Fulton

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for about a year now and it has held up great. It’s a great value for your money the only problem would be the bungee cords.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is good if you know what you are doing.
customer_reviews.text: Don't hang it to high, otherwise the elastic bands will break. If you reduce it to 8ft, that will be a perfect workout.
customer_reviews.author: Renato Vivacqua

customer_reviews.title: Money shot
customer_reviews.text: In combo with the everlast water base and ceiling mount this bag is the real deal. Usable without gloves stays inflated and just what you need to get your speed work back up to par. Highly recommend ... Adrian ...
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Very well made
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it. I switched from a large bag to a tennis ball double end bag which I liked but the bungees and hardness of ball had me look into the 5 inch bag. It's perfect! Small but good feel and great quality
customer_reviews.author: shawn doherty

customer_reviews.title: Nice double end bag
customer_reviews.text: Stays inflated with frequent use and works very well. When inflating, I would recommend (as with all inflatable balls) lubricating the pump needle before inserting to limit any damage to the hole.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Its working great. I got the 7" one
customer_reviews.text: Its working great. I got the 7" one, and I wouldn't want to go any bigger. Used it about 5 times so far, and no problems at all.
customer_reviews.author: Tina D.

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, bungee straps are ehhh...
customer_reviews.text: The bag works great. Only downside is the straps that come with it. The bungee straps are not very forgiving, (not very stretchy). So I just went out and bought an assortment pack of bungees, and it works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Castillo

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made and I literally laughed out loud when I opened it and seen two normal rubber bungee cords that come with it.
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: Good, but.
customer_reviews.text: Bag is designed well, but the 5 inch is just a little too small for what I need.
customer_reviews.author: Dave B

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 2 already, thinking that maybe the first one was a faulty unit or something but it blown out after a couple of weeks as the first one. After that, I decided to make my own double end bag with a soccer ball and so far it is even better than those forty/fifty something dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro

customer_reviews.title: Tough bag and won’t break at the. connections
customer_reviews.text: I. Have purchased four different timing bags and this is the first one that didn’t break in the first week of use and it shows no signs of tearing or stress and we pound it all day long so if your looking for a professional grade bag then try this out
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Moderate!
customer_reviews.text: I doesn't hold air for a long time but still gets the job done. I prefer title but if you don't mind airing it up occasionally, this product is for you.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic customer service. Had a minor issue several months after purchase and this seller responded immediately and solved the problem. Highly recommend and plan to do future business with these folks. Top-notch!
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Perry

customer_reviews.title: bag leaks air. unusable within 24 hrs unless you pump it back up again.
customer_reviews.text: Overall, the bag functions great. I'm rating it as 2 stars because it definitely leaks air. I'll pump it full and it gets nice and hard, but by the next night, it's all soft to the point where the bottom of the bag is visible deflated and has lost it's round shape. It's annoying to have to pump it up every day when I want to use it but I guess for the price...fine.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Wu

customer_reviews.title: Product originally came missing some parts.
customer_reviews.text: When I first ordered this, the plastic bag was already ripped open and it was missing the bungee cables that were supposed to come with the bag. I had to contact Amazon to get them to send me another one. The second package came with everything it was supposed to come with. The product itself is fine quality. The leather is good quality and works well so far, better than the everlast bag.
customer_reviews.author: Jimbo1

customer_reviews.title: Not fancy just tough
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size and balance. My husband as a professional fighter loves it and uses it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Valeria Ochoa

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great I love the 5 inch ball because you have to be real accurate and quick with every move. The only downside is the metal on the bands can come back to bite you that's why I gave it a 4 star review
customer_reviews.author: TheMan

customer_reviews.title: Don’t be fooled
customer_reviews.text: Careful because the material is not what it says it’s made of, also it says it comes with bungees and straps for the ceiling and that hooks. However we had to buy our own connections on our own
customer_reviews.author: Harley

customer_reviews.title: This will leak down over a day or two.
customer_reviews.text: I might fill this with gel foam to keep from topping off the bladder before every use.
customer_reviews.author: Jt

customer_reviews.title: Easy visibility while moving
customer_reviews.text: Easy to see with the coloration. Looses some air at valve. But a great bag.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Nicholson

customer_reviews.title: It’s a good bag but will deflates after a few days.
customer_reviews.text: The only issue I have with the bag is every 2 days The bag deflates.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly what I ordered and was delivered in a short period of time. The bag seems like it is made of quality material.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan LeClair

customer_reviews.title: 3 months later and the bag is flat
customer_reviews.text: The bladder that it comes with is trash. Couple months in and the bag is unusable. Spend more money and buy equipment that will last a lifetime
customer_reviews.author: George Pascual

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: This product has been amazing so far, the only downside is that you MUST buy bungee cords or else the bag is useless.
customer_reviews.author: Alberto Navarro Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Got the mid size bag, and yeah it loses ...
customer_reviews.text: Got the mid size bag, and yeah it loses air after a few weeks but no biggie, just put some more in duh!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great quality and excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: This little bitch is FAST!!! great quality and excellent customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Special Guy

customer_reviews.title: Best double end bag Ive owned!
customer_reviews.text: Held air just fine. Gave it 4/5 instead of 5/5 for one reason: wasnt crazy about the rubber cables that came with it. I know the manufacturer cant predict what kinda ceiling/floor scenario or ratio the buyer will be dealing with, but the rubber ones didnt do it for me. But some bungees from the local Walmart auto department did the trick. $3 fixed it.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis W. Yeomans

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product, and was true to the description. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: JF

customer_reviews.title: Bungie cords are just rubber ones
customer_reviews.text: The Bag is nice and well made but I have to I had to laugh at the cheap rubber bungie cords they ship with the bag ,at this price I was expecting better quality band's . So just beware that's all
customer_reviews.author: Randall C.

customer_reviews.title: It's lopsided
customer_reviews.text: When I pumped it up, it came out lopsided..I still tried using it, and it still works but it would have been nice to have a double-end bag that isn't lopsided
customer_reviews.author: Jinho Chon

customer_reviews.title: Quiality
customer_reviews.text: Exellent quality !! Had other top name brands and even more expenssive and did not last to its value .
customer_reviews.author: Jose R.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality. Bag deflated. Not acceptable
customer_reviews.text: bag is deflated and I need to stop training and pump it back every 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great exterior but terrible bladder
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about the exterior, it's solidly built and I like aiming at the different colors. The bladder has to be filled every single time I use it and usually it's totally flat. I may have gotten a defective bladder but I believe the title bag is stouter.
customer_reviews.author: Blake Aiken

customer_reviews.title: Top Quality Craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: This is really an auxiliary double end bag because it's very small (and fast, naturally). But a larger size would probably also be desired for building different skills. Excellent craftsmanship
customer_reviews.author: jasonwebster777

customer_reviews.title: Too pricy
customer_reviews.text: The straps make it hard to attach since they are stiff and short. Its way too pricy for the quality...
customer_reviews.author: maria

customer_reviews.title: Great double end bag!
customer_reviews.text: So far this is a good double end bag. It’s durable on the punches I hit with.
customer_reviews.author: stevoo156

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: This item is horrible. It deflated on me. I did not even get a chance to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing items
customer_reviews.text: I just received my order but it did not include the cables. I called the support line listed and was told that they couldn’t help me.
customer_reviews.author: Aj

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for striking with all limbs!
customer_reviews.text: I am a trainer and this product is great for striking with upper or lower body. Even if your client is not into fighting, this is great for cardiovascular training and also for awesome stretching of the legs. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: The Trainer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: i like this bag, a bit hard to change the refill bladder though
customer_reviews.author: G-man

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorites!
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite bags...builds accuracy. A lot of the guys can't hit it right as they do not have accuracy to compensate.
customer_reviews.author: Akash Narayan

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I loved this double end bag! Feels very durable and it is exactly what I was wanting.
customer_reviews.author: Alonso

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great bag. Have yet to need to replace bladder. Had to restitch the leather as laces were getting torn.
customer_reviews.author: B. Shapiro

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Just like in a boxing gym. Feels great to have one at home.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Royer

customer_reviews.title: Good, durable parts
customer_reviews.text: This is my third double end bag, and it is my favorite so far. It seems to be well made and produced from strong materials. The bag stitching looks solid, the leather straps are thick, and the cables are not "bungee" type cables but heavy duty rubber cables with a metal S-hook on one side and a metal carabiner on the other side. I feel like this bag will last for quite a while (and if it turns out I'm wrong, I'll come back and update this review). Be sure to research before purchasing to decide what size double end bag best suits your needs (5", 7" or 9").
customer_reviews.author: ThatSteveGuy

customer_reviews.title: Decent.
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan of the bungee cords. They’ll tear up your gloves on uppercuts.
customer_reviews.author: August Lenarz

customer_reviews.title: RINGSIDE double-end bag comparison
customer_reviews.text: I've had my 5" bag about three weeks now. So far, so good. Last night was the first time I've had to add air. Not bad because I've given it at least 7 good beatings so far. It's taking it like a champ.
customer_reviews.author: Dino Pace

customer_reviews.title: Defective bladder
customer_reviews.text: Blader had a hole in it. Never got to use it
customer_reviews.author: adam washington

customer_reviews.title: Must fill before every use don't waste your
customer_reviews.text: Bladder does not hold air and has been leaking since purchased. Must fill before every use don't waste your money
customer_reviews.author: MJO

customer_reviews.title: love it.
customer_reviews.text: 7 inch is fast... love it... works perfect on Everlast heavy bag/speed bag combo stand.
customer_reviews.author: Todd B

customer_reviews.title: Very not durable
customer_reviews.text: Good product but the bladder just busts after Les than 3-4 times use
customer_reviews.author: Mar Li

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Definitely what I wanted. Holding up well to getting hit a lot and hard. Will order another in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Adams

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box, needs to be filled every 2 or 3 days. Otherwise solid construction.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Buczynski

customer_reviews.title: great bag (not for beginners)
customer_reviews.text: well made and good value for the money. This bag may be better than the user. I should have purchased a larger size first as a beginner. Still, excellent craftsmanship.
customer_reviews.author: rick moore

customer_reviews.title: That's it. That's all.
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag. Easy set up. I couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Nagy

customer_reviews.title: Good piece of equipment
customer_reviews.text: The photograph is a little deceiving in that the bag turns out to be very round when inflated, not slightly oblong. Apart from that it's a good quality leather piece with strong stitching.
customer_reviews.author: famousarstit

customer_reviews.title: What a joke. The attachment cables are the cheapest ...
customer_reviews.text: What a joke. The attachment cables are the cheapest black rubber Home Depot bungees...about 1ft long and hard to stretch. Totally non adjustable. Returning ASAP
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Ball Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: The ball was smaller than expected and may have a slow leak. Otherwise, its a good workout and helps eye, ball coordination.
customer_reviews.author: D. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: very good product
customer_reviews.text: I just got mine yesterday and I really like it. it is stitched together well and has a nice feel to it. it's a little smaller than I expected, but that will make for better accuracy in my striking. it has pretty long cables, so make sure you have a pretty tall place to hang it up. I really like it. it's a fun way to improve striking and it's completely different from anything else I've used.
customer_reviews.author: Al David fowler

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty leather, but not sewn evenly.
customer_reviews.text: Pro: heavy duty leather--I hope it lasts longer than my last three... Con: is not sewn evenly, so the ball is not round--it is a crooked and lopsided. It still works, but you may not get a perfect trajectory from your strike.
customer_reviews.author: William A. Jansak

product_meta.title: Ringside Leather Boxing Double End Bag
product_meta.description: The ability to slip a punch and land an effective counter punch is an essential skill for a boxer to possess. The Double End Bag will help you focus on these techniques and sharpen your reflexes to become a more fundamentally solid boxer. The larger Double End Bags are great for teaching the fundamentals. The smaller ones are better for developing your quickness and eye/hand coordination. Made of top quality all leather construction. Complete with new, longer, triple reinforced top and bottom loops. Double End Bag cables included.
feature_bullets: New longer triple reinforced top & bottom loops

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
